wikipedia_page.main: Dominic Hawksley is a British actor who appeared in Death Machine and Entropy. His voice work includes Midnight Club: Street Racing, Midnight Club 2, and the Max Payne wherein he appears in the first game as the mob leader Vladimir Lem. and in the documentary film The Endurance: Shackleton's Legendary Antarctic Expedition. He has also featured in numerous radio dramas and comedies for BBC Radio 4 including The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, The Glittering Prizes  and Life of Penguins.

response: He next appears in , at a party, where he is chatting up Trillian. Arthur tricks him into stepping out of the (flying) building by challenging him to a fight. In the radio adaptation of this he appears in , where he is played by Dominic Hawksley. Hawksley reprises the role in the radio adaptation of , , despite not appearing in that book. Two other characters from the Restaurant – Max Quordlepleen and Zarquon – also appear.
